about_the_game:
From Indie Pop Band OFK


Pop. Love. Panic! The debut 5-song indie pop EP from Los Angeles band OFK, stars of the interactive making-the-band narrative series - We Are OFK. This EP follows the emotional twists and turns of each member's struggles to understand what they want to create, and why they do it.

In The Press


OFK’s signature electro-pop sound was introduced with the energetic, synth-heavy single “Follow/Unfollow” at The Game Awards and has since evolved alongside the narrative of the series. From the R&B-tinged “Fool’s Gold” to the heavy-hitting “Infuriata” and anthemic “Footsteps,” their debut EP takes listeners on a sonic journey mirroring the highs and lows of the band’s virtual journey towards success. Both OFK’s music and the series itself have been met with critical acclaim that includes support from the likes of NME, Rolling Stone, SPIN and more.
